title: Grand Portage National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Staff and volunteers enjoy paddling a replica 40 foot Montreal canoe on Lake Superior during seasonal training. NPS Beth Drost   Â    Grand Portage National Monument is interested in people who enjoy the outdoors, history, nature and want to share their passion with others. Volunteers, student rangers or employees, it takes a wide variety of people with diverse experiences to protect, preserve and support public services at the Monument. Explore these pages for what interests you. Volunteer learn about Volunteer-In-Parks opportunities at Grand Portage and other public lands. Planning Park governing principles and documents. Support Your Park Volunteer, Join Our Friends
